The sound of voices suddenly arrested Captain Pott's fork in mid-air, and the morsel of untasted salt-mackerel dangled uncertainly from the points of the dingy tines as he swung about to face the open door.
Cooper, Francis L. (Francis Le Roy); Goss, John, 1886-1963 [Illustrator]
